subtests.name: Must support valid standard URL PMIs
subtests.message: assert_unreached: Unexpected exception with valid standardized PMI: https://wpt. ReferenceError: PaymentRequest is not defined Reached unreachable code

subtests.name: Must not throw on syntactically valid standardized payment method identifiers, even if they are not supported
subtests.message: assert_unreached: Unexpected exception with valid standardized PMI: e. ReferenceError: PaymentRequest is not defined Reached unreachable code

subtests.name: Must throw on syntactically invalid standardized payment method identifiers
Constructor MUST throw if given an invalid URL-based payment method identifier
